buffs.description: [Enhance active skill] applies even if when Warbear rider is in the Time Shop. (5-star 20 stages, 6-star 40 stages, Max 1000 stages).
buffs.name: Enhance active skill

hidden_abilites: Increases self movement speed and attack power by 10%.
Increases movement speed by 7% and attack speed by 9% for all units.
Attack power and critical damage probability increases greatly against enemy crystal.
[Frenzy] Skill Enhancement: Frenzy damage per attack increases from 3% to 4%, and limit increases from 300% to 400%.

Even if a Warbear rider is in the shop of time, the efficiency of active skill increases. (However, in the shop of time, the efficiency increases by 20 stages per 5-star unit, 40 stages per 6-star unit, and active skill enhancement by warbear riders can not exceed 1000 stages.)
description.skill2: Reach limit break of Maximum Medal Buff from transcended Unit in Time Shop (0%, 0%, 300%, 400%, 500%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Warbear Rider ]
